# Arkei Stealer Analysis – ThreatMon

## What is Arkei Stealer?

**Arkei is a stealer family, mostly written in C++. It was first seen in the wild around May**
2018. It collects data about local computer, browser cookies, messengers, cryptocurrency
wallets. Then it zips the collected data and upload to Hacker’s C&C Channel.

[Arkei Stealer Analysis](https://threatmon.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/ArkeiStealer.docx2_.pdf)
